entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH ENDED, Haldimand County
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:37 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 1:16 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -10.5°C
Wind: WSW 27 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Erie. Amount 4 cm in snow squalls. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Erie this evening. Amount 4 cm in snow squalls. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning. A few flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
